lang::Formattable Class Reference
[Language support library]

#include <Formattable.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Container for an argument that can be formatted to text.


Public Types

enum  ValueType { VALUE_NONE, VALUE_DOUBLE, VALUE_STRING }

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum lang::Formattable::ValueType
 

Type of value.

Enumeration values:
VALUE_NONE  There is no value.
VALUE_DOUBLE  Value is numeric.
VALUE_STRING  Value is string.

Member Function Documentation

int lang::Formattable::format (  char *  buffer,
int  size,
const String &  pattern,
int  pos
)  const
 

Formats the value to the buffer using English/US locale and UTF-8 encoding.

Parameters:
buffer Receives formatted value.
size Maximum number of characters in the formatted value.
pattern Pattern for formatting the value.
pos Pattern position for the formatting options. (-1 if none)
Returns:
Number of characters needed to format the value.
